meanings.sent1: She outvalues her old toy with her new one.
meanings.sent2: His hard work outvalues his natural talent.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outvalues her brother's collection of rocks with her shiny seashells.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outvalues any material possession.
meanings.sent5: The rare diamond outvalues all other gems in the collection.

meanings.definition: To surpass in importance or worth.
meanings.sent1: The safety of the passengers outvalues the speed of the train.
meanings.sent2: In this company, teamwork outvalues individual achievements.
meanings.sent3: The laughter of children outvalues any amount of money.
meanings.sent5: The health of the community outvalues personal convenience.
